## createPublishedId() function

Create a new document id

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createPublishedId(input?: string): PublishedId
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

input


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional input string to create the id from. The input string will be converted to a string safe to use as a sanity document id, i.e. - stripped for any special characters - capped at max 100 chars If no input is provided, a random uuid will be used instead


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[PublishedId](./id-utils.publishedid.md)
